title.narrative: Technical support of trained CBOs for the animation of CRCs in Senegal

description.narrative: 30 CBOs benefited from capacity building in CRC facilitation methodology. These organizations, as a listening club, would collaborate with the radio stations and produce feedbacks in response to their debates on women's rights issues. In order to better regulate CRC's activities and their interactions with radio stations, a local consultant specialized in radio methodology was asked for this purpose.

Results. - 15 listening sessions were organized and conducted by local radio. Internal discussions related to the topics selected during the training (especially marital violence and violence against girls, especially early marriages and their retention at school) were organized. - 318 participants from 75 CBOS were mobilized during the listening club sessions. The strong mobilization of women's organizations in these radio clubs. - CBOs’ interventions in the debates led local authorities to take steps to improve rural women's access to health care. Women can formulate specific requests at the local level which have been considered by local decision-makers

participating-org.narrative: Ministery of Foreign Affairs of The Netherlands
